title: Retrieve a Brought Forward Loss
description: Retrieve a Brought Forward Loss Response

businessId.description: An identifier for the business, unique to the customer.

typeOfLoss.description: The type of business the loss applies to.

lossAmount.description: Brought Forward Loss amount related to the type of loss specified. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxYearBroughtForwardFrom.description: The tax year to which the loss applies. The start year and end year must not span two tax years. No gaps are allowed, for example, 2020-22 is not valid. The minimum tax year is 2018-19. The tax year must have ended.

lastModified.description: The timestamp when the entry was created or last modified

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.
